fr.gouv.vitam.tools.sedalib.inout

Class SIPBuilder

  • Object
    • SIPBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class SIPBuilder
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    The Class SIPBuilder.

    Class for easily constructing SIP from any java application.

    For code samples, consult sedalib-samples module

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      SIPBuilder(String sipPathString, SEDALibProgressLogger sedaLibProgressLogger)
      Instantiates a new SIP builder.

                                  throws SEDALibException
        Creates a root archive unit.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - when the ArchiveUnit has a defined UniqId which is already in the DataObjectPackage

                                         String descriptionLevel,
                                         String title,
                                         String description)
                                  throws SEDALibException
        Creates a root archive unit in the SIP.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        descriptionLevel - the description level
        title - the title
        description - the description
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - when the ArchiveUnit has a defined UniqId which is already in the SIP

      • createSystemExistingRootArchiveUnit

        public ArchiveUnit createSystemExistingRootArchiveUnit(String archiveUnitID,
                                                       String systemId)
                                                throws SEDALibException
        Creates a root archive unit in the SIP which is in fact an existing archive unit in the archiving system. This archive unit is defined by its uniq systemId.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        systemId - the system id
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - when the ArchiveUnit has a defined UniqId which is already in the SIP

      • createSystemExistingRootArchiveUnit

        public ArchiveUnit createSystemExistingRootArchiveUnit(String archiveUnitID,
                                                       String metadataName,
                                                       String metadataValue,
                                                       String descriptionLevel,
                                                       String title)
                                                throws SEDALibException
        Creates a root archive unit in the SIP which is in fact an existing archive unit in the archiving system. This archive unit is defined by a value of a specific metadata which determines a uniq archive unit in the archiving system.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        metadataName - the metadata name
        metadataValue - the metadata value
        descriptionLevel - the description level
        title - the title
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - when the ArchiveUnit has a defined UniqId which is already in the SIP

      • addSubArchiveUnit

        public ArchiveUnit addSubArchiveUnit(String archiveUnitID,
                                     String childArchiveUnitID)
                              throws SEDALibException
        Adds a sub archive unit.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        childArchiveUnitID - the child archive unit ID
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if no identified ArchiveUnit

      • addNewSubArchiveUnit

        public ArchiveUnit addNewSubArchiveUnit(String archiveUnitID,
                                        String childArchiveUnitID,
                                        String descriptionLevel,
                                        String title,
                                        String description)
                                 throws SEDALibException
        Adds a sub archive unit.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        childArchiveUnitID - the child archive unit ID
        descriptionLevel - the description level
        title - the title
        description - the description
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if no identified ArchiveUnit, or when there is already an ArchiveUnit with the same UniqID

      • addFileSubArchiveUnit

        public ArchiveUnit addFileSubArchiveUnit(String archiveUnitID,
                                         String onDiskPath,
                                         String childArchiveUnitID,
                                         String descriptionLevel,
                                         String title,
                                         String description)
                                  throws SEDALibException
        Adds a sub archive unit with the given file as BinaryMaster_1.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the archive unit ID
        onDiskPath - the on disk path
        childArchiveUnitID - the child archive unit ID
        descriptionLevel - the description level
        title - the title
        description - the description
        Returns:
        the archive unit
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if no identified ArchiveUnit, file access problem , or when there is already an ArchiveUnit with the same UniqID

                                 String onDiskPathString,

                          throws SEDALibException
        Adds a file as the usage_version BinaryDataObject de l'archive unit.
        Parameters:
        archiveUnitID - the ArchiveUnit id
        onDiskPathString - the file path string
        usageVersion - the usageVersion metadata in "usage_version" format
        Throws:

                                                throws SEDALibException

        metadataName - the metadata name
        Returns:
        the String formatted metadata value
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if no identified ArchiveUnit, XML read exception or inappropriate xml in rawContenteData
